transArray.content:
I came to Beijing for a business trip and stayed at this store last time. There was some misunderstanding because of the charger.
This time my colleague came over for a business trip and booked this hotel for her which was more convenient and the service was great [strong]

Dear guests, hello! Seeing your positive comments makes us excited. Orange is a hotel full of youthful vitality. It shows you the unique charm of the hotel with its simple style and warm and meticulous service. Your recognition and support continue to inspire us to keep moving forward and reach new heights. We will serve everyone well with our heart. A family friend, looking forward to seeing you next time! I wish you a happy life! Hotel Manager: Zhao Dan
